LEVERAGING THE BLOCKCHAIN TO REDEFINE RENTER-LANDLORD INTERACTIONS

WHY WE EXIST

A global, transparent, and decentralized rental ecosystem

…catalyzing social change and presenting solutions to the following problems:
01
Dependence on credit scores that fail to provide transparency + information truly reflective of the quality and solvency of renters
02
Insufficiencies in centralized operational structures used throughout the rental process
03
Lack of incentivization, reusability, and deep fragmentation

RenterScore

A metric of renter trustworthiness.
Determined by a dynamic algorithm fueled by RenterIQ.
Proprietary
Open source, transparent, community-driven, universal, adaptable.

RNTX Token

The means to transact in and incentivize the ecosystem.
The RntX ecosystem links the core protocol to a tokenized layer of utility.
Guide the evolution of the ID, IQ, and RenterScore.

LEARN BY ASKING

FAQ

Where can I find information regarding the token sale?
Right here on our website! We'll be gradually releasing details on the Token page
How can I get more involved?
Email us at ico@rntx.io, and let us know how you'd like to help! We're excited for our community to expand and look forward to working with everyone as we build.
Where can I go to get a better understanding of RntX?
Reading our whitepaper is the best way to really understand how RntX works and what problems it addresses. We've intentionally spent a lot of time writing a paper that is accessible and unintimidating with the hope of making our mission clear.
Once you're done reading, join our social channels and send us your questions!
What role does the RNTX Token play?
The RNTX Token acts as the means of access to the protocol and network's utility layer. Tokens are used to transact with and utilize the core components, provide and access services, and incentivize positive renter-landlord behaviours and interactions.
HAVE QUESTIONS? ASK US ON TELEGRAM.
